Song.title: So I Will Trust You
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Stephen Altrogge © 2008 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | Cmaj7 | Em7 | Cmaj7 | G | Cmaj7 | Em G/B Cmaj7 | Cmaj7 ]
Verse 1: [Em7]Almighty Maker, [Cmaj7]Universe shaper [G2]You put the stars into [D/F#]space [Em7]Yet You descended, [Cmaj7]You have befriended [G2]Those who had hated Your [D/F#]name, just like [Cmaj7]me [| Cmaj7]
Chorus: [G]King of Glory, I [Cmaj7]know You love me [Em7]So I will trust You, [Cmaj7]yes I will trust You [G]God Almighty, [Cmaj7]You have saved me [Em7]So I will trust You, [Cmaj7]Yes I will trust in [Cmaj7 | G | C2 | Em7 | C2]You
Verse 2: [Em7]Lord over nations, [Cmaj7]King of Creation [G2]Heaven and earth bow to [D/F#]You [Em7]I am Your child, I’ve [Cmaj7]been reconciled [G2]With tender affection You [D/F#]drew me to [Cmaj7]You [| Cmaj7]
Bridge: [Em]How could I [C]not trust my [Dsus]King The [Em]One who has [C]formed me{,} and [Am7]shaped me [Em]I will re[C]joice and will [Dsus]sing For the [Em]One who has [C]made me{,} has [Am7]saved me [(repeat bridge)]
